domosaics.ui.util
Class MessageUtil

java.lang.Object
  domosaics.ui.util.MessageUtil

public class MessageUtil
extends java.lang.Object

An utility class defining methods which make it possible to show basic waring or an informative message dialogs from any point within Angstd.

Author:
Andreas Held

static boolean showDialog(java.lang.String msg)

public static void showWarning(java.lang.String msg)
Shows a basic error message dialog with a specified message.

Parameters:

showDialog

public static boolean showDialog(java.lang.String msg)
Shows a basic dialog containing a message which can be answered with yes or no.

Parameters:
msg - the question to ask
Returns:
no (false) or yes (true)

show3ChoiceDialog

public static int show3ChoiceDialog(java.lang.String msg,
                                    java.lang.Object[] options)
A dialog which gives the user three choices, for instance "Overwrite", "Rename" and "Cancel". The question (message) as well as the choices are free configurable.

Parameters:
msg - the question the user has to answer
options - three options for answering the question
Returns:
the users choice corresponding to order of given choices as integer
